pages.text: A crucible is a block that can collect and hold tears.$(br2)Once filled with enough tears, a crucible can be used to convert certain items by dropping them into it.
Placing a crying obsidian over a crucible will fill it with tears.$(br2)Collecting tears from crying obsidian is rather slow, a more effective alternatives should exist.

pages.text: The gap can be stretched up to 4 blocks.
